price: Yã Mutãnen Littãfi! Don me kuke hujjacẽwa a cikin sha'anin lbrãhĩma, alhãli kuwa ba a saukar da Attaura da injĩla ba fãce daga bãyansa? Shin bã ku hankalta?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تُحَآجُّونَ فِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَتِ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةُ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلُ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima tuḥājjūna fī ib'rāhīma wamā unzilati al-tawrātu wal-injīlu illā min baʿdihi afalā taʿqilūna
